attributes.action: Deporting the wrong parents! causing British chilren distress
attributes.additional_details: why does the government get to allow the odd parent their stay because of a British child but there are 100s that get turned down?? why does some of these British children in the local papers get treated better than others? if you allow 1 man/woman stay because of a British child then all should be allowed. WHY IS MY BRISTISH CHILD different? Why should my British child lose a parent??
